channel.title: vpn on :) bikulov.ORG
channel.description: Recent content in vpn on :) bikulov.ORG

item.title: WireGuard on Ubuntu (server) and Android (client)
item.description: WireGuard is lightweight VPN with extremely simple configuration. All below was tested on Ubuntu 18.04 as server and Anroid 8.0.0 as client.

item.title: Enable tun for OpenVZ Ubuntu 12.04 containers in CentOS 6.4
item.description:
To enable tun device in OpenVZ containers tun module

  • needs to be loaded in the host system (in my case CentOS 6.4)
  • containter (in my case Ubuntu Server 12.04) must be allowed to use tun

item.title: Creating Zip With VPN Client Keys and Configuration Files
item.description: Depends on server configuration, each OpenVPN client needs configuration file (client.conf for *nix and client.ovpn for windows), certificate authority (ca.crt), [optional] tls auth file (ta.key), user crt and key.
